name: Garden of Oblivion (itch)
description:
One day Reven awakens in a strange but beautiful place where the young teenager is treated like a very special guest. There are talking animals, each being rather kind and friendly. Unless the door is mentioned. The one in the back of the garden. But what could be behind that mysterious door ? And why Reven isn't allowed to go out ? You shouldn't try to know the truth…

Reven An ordinary teenager with a strong character that has been sent to the garden for obscure reasons. Humpty A friendly bunny who seems to know Reven very well. He's the most knowledgeable animal in the garden. Duck McDuck A noble gentleman who likes to meditate while watching the flowers of the garden. Fond of philosophical debates. Fox-tan Extremely shy but kind and reliable, she tries her best to welcome Reven in the garden. Easily flustered. Lotte Self proclamed librarian of the garden. She loves books above all else and spend most of her time shut off in the library.

  • Writing / Project Leader: Helia
  • Art: Eolyus, Melow, Orties
  • Music: Roganis
  • Programming: Keul
  • GUI: Xian

Garden of Oblivion is an original adventure game made using RenPy and inspired by many abstract indie works with horror elements. There are two differents endings to reach. It was originally created for Ludum Dare 30 with « Connected Worlds » as a theme.
